name: HOLLOW PARK
description:
A short first-person horror-action game/aesthetic experience. Includes:

  • Skulls
  • Gun
  • Class consciousness

Art, design, programming, and music by @lycaontalks.

Assets used:

  • "Vis wz. 35" by Dante
  • Many textures from texturelib.com
  • "Skull" by Atmostatic
  • "The Conquest of Bread" by  Pyotr Kropotkin
